trans-unit.source: Provides command related utility methods that register <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> objects for class owners and commands, add and remove command event handlers, and provides services for querying the status of a command.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona métodos de utilidad relacionados con los comandos que registran objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> y <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> para propietarios de clase y comandos, agregan y quitan controladores de eventos de comando y proporcionan servicios para consultar el estado de un comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> is responsible for managing routed commands.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> es responsable de administrar los comandos enrutados.

trans-unit.source: For more information about commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los comandos, consulte [Introducción estableciendo](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> to register a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassCommandBinding%2A> para registrar un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> a una clase en lugar de una instancia.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> to register an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to a class as opposed to an instance.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> para registrar un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> a una clase en lugar de una instancia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> method forces the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> método fuerza la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> para generar el <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event informs a command source to query the command it is associated with to determine whether or not the command can execute.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> eventos informa a un origen de comando para el comando que está asociado para determinar si se permite o no se puede ejecutar el comando de consulta.

trans-unit.source: The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
trans-unit.target: Elemento al que se va a adjuntar <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The can execute handler.
trans-unit.target: puede ejecutar el controlador.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Asocia el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado al elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> y los asocia a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que es un origen de comando para el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is created and associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: En primer lugar, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> se creó y asoció el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> are created.
trans-unit.target: Después, el <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> se crean.

trans-unit.source: And finally, the handlers are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Y por último, los controladores se asocian a la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddCanExecuteHandler%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.AddExecutedHandler%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="element" /> o <paramref name="handler" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to attach <c>handler</c> to.
trans-unit.target: Elemento al que se va a adjuntar <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The executed handler.
trans-unit.target: Controlador ejecutado.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Asocia el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado al elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> and attaches them to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> which is a command source for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.

trans-unit.source: First, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is created and associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: En primer lugar, el <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> se creó y asoció el <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Help%2A> comando.

trans-unit.target: Después, el <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> se crean.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="element" /> o <paramref name="handler" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica el evento adjunto <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica el evento adjunto <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed" />.

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> to raise the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Obliga a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> a provocar el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> only pays attention to certain conditions in determining when the command target has changed, such as change in keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> sólo presta atención a ciertas condiciones para determinar cuándo ha cambiado el destino del comando, como el cambio de foco del teclado.

trans-unit.source: In situations where the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> does not sufficiently determine a change in conditions that cause a command to not be able to execute, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> can be called to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: En situaciones donde la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> no lo suficientemente determinar un cambio en las condiciones que provocan un comando que no puedan ejecutar, <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> puede llamarse para forzar la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> para generar el <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> to periodically call <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> to force the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> event.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se usa un <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherTimer> para llamar periódicamente a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.InvalidateRequerySuggested%2A> para forzar la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> para generar el <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RequerySuggested> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica el evento adjunto <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewCanExecute" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" /> attached event.
trans-unit.target: Identifica el evento adjunto <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted" />.

trans-unit.source: The class with which to register <c>commandBinding</c>.
trans-unit.target: Clase con la que se va a registrar <c>commandBinding</c>.

trans-unit.source: The command binding to register.
trans-unit.target: Enlace de comandos que debe registrarse.

trans-unit.source: Registers a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Registra <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> con el tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enables a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> to be associated with a class instead than an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> asociarse con una clase en lugar de una instancia de una clase.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="commandBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="type" /> o <paramref name="commandBinding" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The type to register <c>inputBinding</c> with.
trans-unit.target: Tipo con el que se va a registrar <c>inputBinding</c>.

trans-unit.source: The input binding to register.
trans-unit.target: Enlace de entrada que debe registrarse.

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Registra el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding" /> especificado con el tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method enables an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> to be associated with a type instead of an instance of a class.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite un <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> asociarse con un tipo en lugar de una instancia de una clase.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> or <paramref name="inputBinding" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="type" /> o <paramref name="inputBinding" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: Elemento del que se va a quitar <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The can execute handler.
trans-unit.target: puede ejecutar el controlador.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Desasocia el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado del elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se separa un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que tenía anteriormente se ha adjuntado a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="element" /> o <paramref name="handler" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The element to remove <c>handler</c> from.
trans-unit.target: Elemento del que se va a quitar <c>handler</c>.

trans-unit.source: The executed handler.
trans-unit.target: Controlador ejecutado.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Desasocia el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado del elemento especificado.

trans-unit.target: puede ejecutar el controlador.

trans-unit.target: Desasocia el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado del elemento especificado.

trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se separa un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que tenía anteriormente se ha adjuntado a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.target: Controlador ejecutado.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Desasocia el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler" /> especificado del elemento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example detaches a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> and an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> which had previously been attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se separa un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que tenía anteriormente se ha adjuntado a un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> or <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <paramref name="element" /> o <paramref name="handler" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> detects conditions that might change the ability of a command to execute.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager" /> detecta condiciones que podrían cambiar la capacidad de un comando de ejecutarse.

trans-unit.source: This event holds onto the handler as a weak reference.
trans-unit.target: Este evento se bloquea en el controlador como una referencia débil.

trans-unit.source: Objects that listen for this event should keep a strong reference to their event handler to avoid it being garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que realizan escuchas para este evento deben mantener una referencia segura a su controlador de eventos para evitar que se recolecte.

trans-unit.source: This can be accomplished by having a private field and assigning the handler as the value before or after attaching to this event.
trans-unit.target: Esto puede realizarse al tener un campo privado y asignar al controlador como valor antes o después de adjuntar a este evento.
